bio: Interfaith activist, writer, solving social problems through storytelling, tea drinker, attempter, optimist, sent here to fix things. Josef Korbel School of International Studies at the University of Denver University of Denver Aurora University ACME Vegan Owner/Founder The 1010 Project Director of Operations Spotted Koi, LLC Project Manager Interfaith Youth Core Faiths Act Fellow Wackerlin Center for Faith and Action Wackerlin Fellows University of Denver Reproduction Operator Ashoka Foundation (Changemakers) Community Mobilizer
